bibl.note: À propos de: Mark Depauw & Willy Clarysse, How Christian was Fourth Century Egypt? Onomastic Perspectives on Conversion, VigChr 67 (2013) pp. 407-435, 15 tabl., 4 figg. - Any attempt to track ""conversion"" on the basis of naming begs two questions: what constitutes ""being Christian""? what do new naming practices actually represent in the overall assimilation of Christian traditions? - Avec résumé en anglais.
